Regulation (EU) 2024/1244 (IEPR), Annex I, provides a list of activities that fall within its scope.
Recital (12) states: ‘To comply with the requirements of the Protocol, the reporting requirements
provided for in this Regulation should apply to all activities listed in Annex I to the Protocol and, in
